steps.title: Form them in an "L"shape.
steps.content: Form them in an "L"shape. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Draw this rectangle at the inner corner of the "L" shape.
steps.content: Draw this rectangle at the inner corner of the "L" shape.

steps.title: Divide the top rectangle in the middle.
steps.content: Divide the top rectangle in the middle. Draw a perpendicular line in the lower half about 1/3 of the way down the rectangle. Draw curved lines at the points as shown in the illustration. [2] X Research source

steps.title: It is up to you how much detail you want your gun to have.
steps.content: It is up to you how much detail you want your gun to have. Some of the essential details are the trigger, which can be made by drawing a triangle in the oval you made, and the sight/s by drawing 2 triangles at the top rectangle. Also, draw a small rectangle at the end of the L shape for the hole of the barrel. [3] X Research source

steps.title: You can now erase the sketch.
steps.content: You can now erase the sketch.
